title: Ray vs Sora: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Ray vs Sora. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Ray and Sora? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Ray vs Sora
paragraphs: Ray (ml frameworks) is Unified framework for scaling AI and Python applications, providing distributed computing primitives and ML libraries for parallel processing.. It's known for Distributed Computing, Scaling, Auto-scaling.
Sora (generative ai) is OpenAI's text-to-video model that creates high-quality videos up to a minute long from text instructions.. Users choose it for AI, OpenAI, Video Generation.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Ray: Distributed computing, Auto-scaling, ML ecosystem integration
Sora: High-quality video generation, Up to 60 seconds duration, Complex scene creation

verdict: Both Ray and Sora are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Ray for Distributed Computing, Sora for AI.
